benchmark_details.name: Stanford eConsult Templates
benchmark_details.overview: This study evaluates the capacity of large language models (LLMs) to generate structured clinical consultation templates for electronic consultation using expert-crafted templates.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To assess the ability of contemporary large language models (LLMs) to generate clinically useful consultation templates that adapt to individual consults.

data.source: Stanford eConsult Templates Dataset consisting of expert-generated templates for inbound specialist consultations.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on template item accuracy and completeness against expert templates.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores represent better alignment with clinical requirements and relevant information prioritization.
methodology.validation: Agreed clinical evaluations using independent raters.
